title: The MC Serch Interview: Addiction, MF Doom, The White Rapper Show, DJ Vlad Beef & More
description:
MC Serch is known for his storytelling, in depth interviews and awesome hip hop anecdotes! He shares with Adam about Doom, Nas, Jay-Z, Dre, Eminem, The White Rapper Show, new artists he supports! Plus, Serch clears up a few things about beef with Vlad. He also talks about his new exciting projects, music, podcasts, documentaries and more!
https://www.instagram.com/emceeserch/
https://www.instagram.com/serchsays/
https://twitter.com/MCSerch
https://twitter.com/BrkingAnonymity
https://www.facebook.com/mcserch
